text.div:
HSPC Allergy/Intolerance Status Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    55561003Active (qualifier value)
    260385009Negative (qualifier value)
    261665006Unknown (qualifier value)
    255545003Definite (qualifier value)
    410605003Confirmed present (qualifier value)
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-allergyintolerancestatus

name: HSPC Allergy/Intolerance Status Value Set
description: SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
